articles.title: My life under threat over Queen Elizabeth’s tweet – Prof - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Nigerian-born American professor, Uju Anya, has said her life has been under threat since her Thursday tweet on the late Queen Elizabeth II.
articles.content:
Nigerian-born American professor, Uju Anya, has said her life has been under threat since her Thursday tweet on the late Queen Elizabeth II.

articles.title: North American markets tumble, with U.S. stocks posting worst drop since June 2020 - CP24
articles.description: North American markets tumbled Tuesday after the latest reading on U.S. inflation disappointed traders, with Canada's main stock index down more than 300 points and all three major U.S. stock indexes seeing their worst day since June 2020.
articles.content: TORONTO - North American markets tumbled Tuesday after the latest reading on U.S. inflation disappointed traders, with Canada's main stock index down more than 300 points and all three major U.S. sto… [+797 chars]
